text.text:
Top-Notch Care and Hospitality

During our recent stay at The Leela Palace Bangalore for the Keysight Conference, we had the pleasure of being assisted by Nathaniel, one of the butlers at the hotel. From the moment we arrived, Nathaniel went above and beyond to ensure our comfort and convenience.

He was attentive, thoughtful, and incredibly professional throughout our stay. Whether it was helping us with last-minute requests, guiding us through the property, or ensuring we had everything we needed during the conference, Nathaniel handled everything with grace and efficiency. His warm demeanor and attention to detail truly enhanced our experience at the Leela.

It’s rare to come across someone so genuinely committed to guest service. Nathaniel is a true asset to The Leela Palace, and we’re grateful for the care and hospitality he extended to us.

Highly recommended!

text.text:
I had a wonderful stay at The Leela Palace Bangalore. From the moment I arrived, the warm and welcoming hospitality stood out. The rooms are spacious, beautifully designed, and equipped with all the modern amenities you’d expect from a luxury property. I especially enjoyed the serene views and the lush greenery surrounding the hotel—perfect for a peaceful walk outdoors.

The breakfast selection was impressive, offering a range of delicious international cuisines. The hotel also features a well-equipped gym and a relaxing spa area, making it easy to unwind and recharge. Overall, a truly memorable experience and a place I would gladly return to.

text.text:
Disappointing Experience at The Leela Palace, Bangalore

I recently visited The Leela Palace for an event and was quite disappointed by the overall experience, especially considering it’s a 5-star property.

Rude staff behavior: On arrival, while searching for the restroom and event venue, I was misdirected twice. A staff member (appeared to be a manager) rudely yelled at us once he realized we were from the event, saying we weren't allowed in that area.

No place to work: I had an urgent office call and couldn’t find a place to sit in the event area. When I moved to the garden, security asked me to leave. At the reception area, I was forced to sit on the floor. Staff kept rudely shooing us away without suggesting a proper spot to work from.

Inadequate facilities: Only one washroom was available for a large crowd. It became dirty quickly, with no prompt cleaning. Paint was peeling in several areas, which was surprising for a hotel of this stature.

For a premium hotel hosting corporate guests, the lack of courtesy, basic amenities, and professionalism was very disappointing.

text.text:
Until I was in the hotel, I never got a feeling that I was in a city or in Bangalore. It felt like I am somewhere far away from city amidst those trees with rain throughout the day.
Room service was extraordinary. Food was very good. Breakfast buffet had limited options but we could always order if anything is needed. We couldn't have breakfast early in the morning so got it packed to room at no extra cost.
They say pool water is temperature controlled but in actual it was not. Spa, gym and pool facilities are available. Spa is way too costly. Gym was well maintained. Pool was well maintained too. It was really pleasant to stay there. But they could have had indoor games, as we can't step out during rains and when pool is too chill.
24hrs hot water facility is available. Evenings and mornings in balcony were just awesome.

text.text:
Great rooms, terrible service at reception. Followup was ignored

The rooms were great. Spacious and clean, with great views of the city. The breakfast spread was also very nice. The stay was good and the restaurants seemed nice and the restaurant staff were very welcoming.

The check-in/front desk however, was not good.
We explicitly asked for 2 key cards and they gave us just one. A lady at the reception brushed me off quite rudely and insisted that she gave me 2 keycards. I had to get her boss involved and she was too arrogant to even acknowledge her mistake.

At check-out, I got my change in cash and another lady (different one from check-in) at the reception was quite condescending for some reason and decided by herself to shortchange me by 64 Rs. Its not a big amount, and I would have been fine with it, if she had only asked me first. It doesn't matter if its 1 rupee as well, it is only common courtesy to ask my permission first.

Overall, the hotel itself is nice but the reception staff damaged my experience a lot.

Edit (Aug/20): We reached out to the person who commented below on Aug/11 and there has been no reply yet. Just proves the point that the service here is terrible.
That decides it, never staying here again and would not recommend it to anyone either.

text.text:
Passing the parcel at Shangri-La!

I have stayed at Shangri-La multiple times before and always held it to a certain standard, but this visit was nothing short of a letdown. Right from check-in, the experience was marred by Gautam’s rude and unbothered attitude. When we reached the room, it reeked of a foul smell. On calling the service center, the first housekeeping staff walked in completely clueless and uninterested. His supervisor, Umesh, casually told me to “check with the front desk” if I wanted a room change something I never expected to hear at Shangri-La, where hospitality has always been seamless.

It only went further downhill. When Pavan came to assist us with moving bags to the other room, he literally made a face at us, banged the door, and walked away  a level of rudeness that was simply shocking for a brand like this. Breakfast was equally chaotic. All we asked for was a takeaway, only to be brushed off by a staff member who pointed us to another counter while standing in front of a whole stack himself.

At checkout, Laqshay didn’t bother to ask about our stay or invite feedback perhaps because they already know how poor the experience is. all we got was a flat, meaningless “sorry.”

Overall, this stay was charmless, careless, and a complete waste of time. For a brand built on warmth and world-class hospitality, Shangri-La has truly failed this time.

text.text:
ITC Gardenia, Bangalore, is the epitome of luxury and elegance. From the moment you step in, you’re greeted with exceptional hospitality—every staff member, from the security team to the managers, is warm, courteous, and professional. The rooms are beautifully designed, spacious, and offer a stunning view from the balcony that truly elevates the experience.

The complimentary breakfast is a highlight—an elaborate spread featuring a wide variety of Indian and international dishes, all delicious and served in a lovely setting. Staying guests also get a 20% discount on other meals and liquor, which is a great bonus considering the top-notch quality of the food and beverages.

What truly sets ITC Gardenia apart is the flawless service and deeply ingrained culture of hospitality. Every detail is thoughtfully taken care of, making your stay feel special and indulgent. It’s absolutely worth every penny for the luxury, comfort, and experience you receive. And if you’re lucky, you might even catch some great offers. Highly recommended for both business and leisure stays!

I recently stayed at the Hyatt Centric Hotel in Hebbal, Bangalore, and honestly it was such a great experience. The food here is literally the best I’ve ever had at a hotel – so good that it actually runs out sometimes because of how popular it is. Their in-house restaurant, Cosmo, is an absolute highlight. Every meal felt freshly prepared, full of flavor, and way above what you’d usually expect from hotel dining.

What really stood out besides the food was the staff. They were extremely friendly and genuinely welcoming from the moment I checked in. You don’t always see that level of warmth and consistency in hotels, but here it felt natural and sincere. They really took extreme care of guests, making sure everything was smooth and comfortable throughout my stay.

Overall, Hyatt Centric Hebbal sets the bar really high, from the outstanding food at Cosmo to the incredible hospitality of the staff. Definitely recommend it if you’re in Bangalore!

text.text:
Comfortable Stay, But Deeply Disappointing Dining Experience

The Ritz-Carlton hotel itself is very comfortable. I had no issues with the stay — the rooms and amenities met expectations. However, I made the mistake of booking a package that included two meals a day (breakfast and dinner), and this turned out to be a major regret.

Dinner is served at The Market, the hotel's so-called continental restaurant, and both the food and service were truly disappointing. The atmosphere is chaotic — dim lighting combined with loud conversations made it hard to relax. The food, even by the standards of Indian-style continental cuisine, was objectively bad.

I highly recommend not including the lunch or dinner package in your booking. Breakfast was decent, but dinner was a daily struggle.

Over the course of three nights, my companion and I left more than half of our food uneaten. I wonder if the staff ever paused to consider what that might mean. This restaurant simply does not live up to the global standards of the Ritz-Carlton brand.

It became something I dreaded each evening, and I’m honestly relieved that I no longer have to eat dinner here.

text.text:
Ritz in Bangalore is in the central part of Bangalore with lots to do around the area. The decor is  opulent that blends style and luxury well. Plenty of restaurants and food options and from my room I could hear live music late into the night which made it feel lively.

The rooms are spacious and luxurious. The only reason for me to give them a lower rating is that there was smell in the bedding and in the bathrobe; I didn’t expect this from Ritz. And the smell was bad, musty, stale and giving a feeling of unwashed.

Rest of the experience was great. The staff was welcoming, kind and the service was as I would expect from Ritz- outstanding!

text.text:
What a disaster of service!! Completely undeserving of what is otherwise a great property with spacious good rooms, and even bigger dis service to the brand of Ritz.

Be very sure that you have triple checked that the car is there at the airport for you, if you have paid the good dollars to get one for airport transfers. Chances are the airport representatives who are well trained to act innocent and say ‘sorry’ at the drop of a hat, may not have your booking and make you wait for almost an hour to get someone else’ booked car to fetch you. Great welcome at the airport!!

Make sure and feel your duty to humbly request the housekeeping to clean your room, else even at 4pm in the evening your room may look like this. The answer is very convenient- we do time management 😊. Meaning they will manage their time to ensure that you remain in the discomfort of an unclean room even after almost the day is over and evening is approaching. May be Ritz Carlton has a different definition of room cleaning and turn down!

text.text:
⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

I had the pleasure of staying at Four Seasons, Bangalore for 4 days and the experience was truly amazing. The staff is extremely well-trained, courteous, and reflects a culture built on strong values, which really enhances the overall guest experience.

The rooms are spacious, comfortable, and beautifully maintained. The front office team was very helpful and professional, while the kitchen team deserves special mention for the delightful dining experience — the breakfast spread was absolutely superb!

The hotel’s surroundings are wonderful, and its prime location makes it very convenient. I also loved the unique vertical structure with around 20 floors, offering smooth and seamless transitions across all services.

Overall, a fantastic stay and I’d highly recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Bangalore!

text.text:
Rooms and facilities seem opulent but beyond that this place is empty: the biggest downfall is the inexperienced staff and lackluster food scene.

While housekeeping staff really seemed to care about customers, the leadership team and front desk seem to be doing this as just a job, and don’t care about providing the best customer service. There is no passion or energy needed for the hotel business.

Front desk and restaurant staff need retraining on basic etiquette and how to respond to feedback. Their interactions are almost robotic. Would recommend staying at the Ritz Carlton or the Leela to learn what great service looks like!

We tried Cur8 for breakfast and dinner, and Far & East for dinner. Food at both places does not have taste or originality, and leaves nothing to be remembered. At Rs 8000 for an entree and appetizer, Far & East is a total joke. The service was a total failure as well. Check out Yataii in Shangri-La instead if you’re looking for great food and service.

We realized opulence and throwing money at the outside appearance and architecture alone like Four Seasons does, cannot buy great customer experience.

Don’t waste your money and time at the Four Seasons until they really value customer feedback and make some major changes to address these issues.

I recently had the pleasure of dining at the Four Seasons Hotel Bangalore, and I must say, the experience was nothing short of exceptional. Dinner was an absolute delight. The ambiance of the restaurant was elegant yet relaxed, setting the perfect tone for a memorable evening. Every bite was full of flavor, and it was clear that the chefs take great pride in their craft.

Overall, the Four Seasons Hotel Bangalore delivers on every front—luxurious hospitality, exquisite dining, and a warm, inviting atmosphere. I look forward to returning soon and highly recommend it to anyone looking for a truly elevated experience.

Location-wise, it was perfect—close to everything I needed, but still quiet enough to feel like a getaway. I’ve stayed in a lot of hotels, and this one easily ranks at the top. I’ll definitely be coming back.

text.text:
recently stayed at JW Marriott in Bengaluru for a week with my leadership team for a business conference. While my overall stay and hospitality was warm and welcoming, there were some surprising lapses in service that I wouldn’t have expected from a brand of this caliber!!!

The highlights? The little touches that made me feel at home. Payal from JW Kitchen greeted me every morning with a warm smile and recognized my room number by my face. Athili, the lovely housekeeper, did a fresh flower décor on my bed each day and created the most soothing turndown tub service after long workdays. Dinesh from the concierge went above and beyond by bringing me medication when I wasn’t feeling well - even though I had only requested for a cup of cumin seeds. The AYS team was consistently responsive and polite. Laasya from Guest Relations made my day with a sweet JW note and treat for being a Bonvoy member. Sakthi from the wellness center took care of us with genuine kindness during facility maintenance. And Abhishek from housekeeping was always warm and engaging in our interactions!!

Other favorites from my stay included the fantastic breakfast spread, the well-equipped wellness center, pool, and gym, and the beautiful view of Cubbon Park from my room’s balcony. The smiling restaurant staff, who patiently served me without a single frown, truly elevated my experience, and I really appreciate each and everyone from the F&Brb team! They did a fabulous job!!!!

However, there were some aspects that fell short. One day, I returned to my room and found a small dead roach inside a paper bag of breakfast bread I had packed and accidentally left behind. While I can’t say for sure whether it came from the kitchen or the room, it was alarming. Housekeeping was inconsistent with some basic stuffs like one of the trash bins left uncleared, the kettle not cleaned for nearly five days, and essentials like water bottles and glasses were sometimes not restocked. I ignored these, thinking they were one-time misses, but it began to feel like a recurring pattern. At breakfast one day, my simple request for a one-egg cheese masala omelette with chicken sausages got messed up - twice!!!

One particularly disappointing experience was when I arranged a surprise room decoration for the son of our company’s COO (who was also staying there). I had clearly asked the GRM, Sanchita, to inform me once the guests had stepped out before starting the decoration - but she didn’t. The surprise was mishandled. Karan, the RDM, made a kind gesture to redo the setup in another room and added our gift, which I truly appreciated. However, neither he nor the original GRM followed up with me or met me afterward. Sanchita, in particular, didn’t acknowledge the oversight or offer a sincere apology, and I truly feel that she doesn't have the eye for detail that a GRM should have!!

Despite all this, I want to highlight that many team members were truly exceptional - their warmth, smiles, and willingness to go the extra mile made parts of my stay genuinely memorable. But at a JW Marriott, I do expect the basics to be non-negotiable: clean and well-serviced rooms, consistent housekeeping, and accurate attention to guest requests. That’s what defines luxury!!

I hope this feedback helps the team improve and better align guest experiences with the high standards JW is known for!

Would I return? Possibly yes - or maybe not!!! Only time can tell that!!

text.text:
I recently had the pleasure of visiting The Leela Bhartiya City, and I must say — it felt like stepping into a city within a city. The experience was nothing short of extraordinary.

From the moment you enter, you're surrounded by lush greenery and thoughtfully designed pathways that make every walk feel refreshing and calming. The entire property is beautifully integrated into Bhartiya City, which itself is a vibrant urban ecosystem. It’s not just a hotel — it’s an experience. With a school, corporate offices, a serene park, a mall, a cinema theatre, and so much more within walking distance, it truly feels self-contained yet seamlessly connected.

The hotel itself stands tall with its signature Leela elegance — luxurious interiors, warm hospitality, and a peaceful ambiance that makes you want to stay longer. Whether you're here for business, leisure, or just a quick getaway, the surroundings and amenities make it the perfect destination.

If you’re looking for a place that combines luxury, convenience, and an escape into nature — The Leela Bhartiya City is a place you must visit.

text.text:
Exceptional Food, But Reservations Need Work

I recently dined at The Leela Bhartiya City and was thoroughly impressed with the culinary experience. The food was absolutely top-notch — each dish beautifully presented, flavorful, Whether it was the rich Indian delicacies, the globally-inspired dishes, or the decadent desserts, everything surpassed expectations. The ambiance is elegant yet inviting, and the service (once seated) was warm and attentive.

However, I do feel compelled to highlight one recurring issue: reservations. Despite booking in advance, our table wasn’t ready on arrival, and we had to wait significantly past our reservation time. For a hotel of this caliber, better reservation management would go a long way in improving the overall guest experience.

That said, the food more than made up for the initial hiccup. I’d still recommend dining here, especially if you’re looking for a special culinary outing — just be prepared for a potential wait, even with a reservation.

text.text:
Our stay at Vivanta, Residency Road, Bangalore, was extremely disappointing and far from the standards we expect from the Taj group.

1.	Poor Technical Support – The technicians had absolutely no knowledge of how to connect the WiFi or resolve the TV issues. We spent over two hours with continuous disturbance from the technician, only to eventually resolve the issue on our own. The Samsung Android TV provided in the room seems to be just for show.
2.	Substandard Amenities – The bathroom amenities were shocking for a Taj property. They provided cheap ₹5 soaps instead of a proper handwash bottle. Even after multiple requests, they didn’t provide handwash and instead sent more small soaps.
3.	Unresponsive Reception – Nobody answers calls at the reception, making even basic communication a hassle.
4.	Delayed Room Service – Any food order takes over 45 minutes to arrive, which is highly inconvenient.
5.	Overall Service Experience – The service quality is far below Taj standards. From the very first day, the experience was pathetic, stressful, and disappointing. Despite paying for 8 days upfront, the first day itself left us dissatisfied and regretful of our choice.

We had high expectations from Taj, but our experience at Vivanta, Residency Road, has been extremely disappointing. I would not recommend this property to anyone.

⸻

text.text:
Well maintained heritage property. As with all Taj heritage properties, the staff were great. Always going above and beyond. It’s a short walk to common areas but there are golf carts if needed and the greenery adds to the charm. Since its heritage there are no elevators to the individual buildings which are G+1, so just be mindful of booking ground floor rooms only when booking for elderly or people with mobility issues. The food is good and the breakfast is well thought out. It can get a bit chaotic when it is full house like over the long weekend.
Special mention to our housekeeping staff Therthei, who worked alone and was super efficient in getting our room tidy for us always. The duty manager also was kind in offering to switch our room and offered us some treats in the room when we complained about a minor noise issue. We chose to decline the change in room eventually but we do appreciate these little gestures and over all would come back for a little slice of peace in the bustle of the city.

text.text:
Amazing Stay at Taj West End, Bengaluru 🌿✨

I recently stayed at Taj West End, Bengaluru, and it was an incredible experience! The property is spread across 22 acres of lush greenery, making it feel like a peaceful oasis in the heart of the city.

From the moment I arrived, I was welcomed warmly with a mogra mala and a refreshing welcome drink — a lovely traditional touch. The hospitality throughout my stay was top-notch, truly reflecting the Taj brand.

The buffet at the restaurant was outstanding, offering an amazing variety of food to suit every taste. Every meal was a delight!

The ambiance, greenery, service, and attention to detail make this place totally worth it. I highly recommend Taj West End to anyone visiting Bengaluru — it's value for money and a must-stay experience.

text.text:
I stayed here for my birthday, and overall the experience was quite underwhelming given the price and the Taj branding.

The rooms were below average for the standard expected, and the food was also just average. For the high cost, the value was definitely not worth it.

The valet parking service was absolutely disappointing. My car was returned dirty and muddy, the bonnet left open, and even my dashcam disconnected – completely unacceptable.

On the positive side, the hotel staff were polite and hospitable, which I appreciated.

Unfortunately, the negatives outweighed the positives, and I wouldn’t recommend this property if you’re looking for the true Taj experience.

text.text:
I recently stayed at the Taj MG for 3 days and had a mixed experience that I feel compelled to share.
The Positives:
The hotel's accommodation standards are excellent, and the staff are genuinely warm and welcoming in their greetings. You can tell they want to provide good service, and the property maintains the luxury feel you'd expect from the Taj brand.
The Issues:
Unfortunately, while the staff excel at pleasantries, they seem to struggle with proper room preparation and issue resolution. Upon arrival, our room had empty shower gel dispensers and a non-functioning TV - basic amenities that should have been checked before handing over the room to guests, especially given the hotel's star rating.
While the shower gel issue was resolved immediately when I mentioned it, it shouldn't have been an issue in the first place. A hotel of this caliber should have proper housekeeping checks to ensure rooms are guest-ready.
More concerning was the TV problem. Despite raising this with multiple staff members throughout my 3-day stay and receiving repeated assurances that it would be "looked into," the issue was never resolved. It's baffling how a premier property can fail to address such a straightforward maintenance issue.
Bottom Line:
For a property that positions itself as premium hospitality, basic room preparation oversights and inability to handle guest requests are unacceptable. While the physical property and staff demeanor are pleasant, the attention to detail and follow-through need serious improvement.
I expected much better from such an established hotel group.

Our one-night stay at Taj MG Road was nothing short of magical. From the moment we arrived, we felt enveloped in luxury. The warm welcome, elegant interiors, and impeccable service made us feel truly royal.

The room was beautifully designed with a perfect blend of classic charm and modern comfort – ideal for a romantic escape. Every detail, from the soft linens to the ambient lighting, created a serene and intimate atmosphere.

Overall, our stay was a perfect mix of luxury, romance, and top-tier hospitality. Taj MG made our getaway truly unforgettable, and we can't wait to return.

text.text: I've been at this hotel for a week and I'm having a great experience. The breakfast food in the hotel restaurant is perfect. It has options for every taste, and everything is fresh and well-prepared. Some items are made to order, like eggs and some traditional Indian dishes, and the coffee is also made to order, even though it's all part of the buffet. I had my birthday this week, and everyone treated me extra special. The rooms are quiet—I'm on the first floor, and yet we didn't hear anything from outside. The street outside the hotel is also quiet. The bed is large and comfortable, the mattress is hard, but perfect. I also drank the water provided in the rooms, and had no problems at all. Overall, a great experience. I recommend it.

text.text:
I had the most delightful stay at Hotel Grand Mercure, a true gem of luxury and warmth! The staff’s infectious positivity and genuine kindness made every moment special—from the warm welcome at check-in to the attentive service throughout my stay. Their smiles and eagerness to assist created an atmosphere of pure joy, making me feel like royalty.
The culinary experience was exceptional, with an array of healthy, flavorful dishes that were as nourishing as they were delicious. Fresh, vibrant ingredients shone in every meal, from crisp salads to wholesome entrees, all beautifully presented and bursting with taste. The chefs clearly prioritize quality and wellness, catering to every palate with finesse.
What truly elevated the experience was the enchanting fragrance that enveloped the entire premises. A subtle, refreshing scent of citrus and florals lingered in the air, from the elegant lobby to the serene corridors, creating a calming and luxurious ambiance that was simply divine.
Every detail at Hotel Grand Mercure exudes sophistication, but it’s the cheerful staff, wholesome cuisine, and captivating fragrance that make this hotel an unforgettable haven. I can’t wait to return!

text.text:
I was assigned a room directly opposite the service lobby, which remains open at night and causes consistent noise past midnight. This severely disrupted my sleep and led to headaches and immense discomfort.

Adding to the ordeal, today at 2 PM, when I tried to get some daytime rest, I was again disturbed this time by construction noises from renovation work in the property. Astonishingly, only after this disturbance was a room change even considered basic rest should be a given, not something guests must fight for.

It's basic courtesy for a brand like Marriott to disclose ongoing renovations on their website so guests like me can make an informed choice. The absence of this transparency is deeply disappointing.

Overall, a pathetic experience. The only reason this review isn’t a zero-star rating is due to the housekeeping staff and some other staff, who were courteous and professional.

text.text:
Exquisite Luxury and Impeccable Service: A Heavenly Experience at The Oberoi, Bangalore

Rating: ★★★★★

The Oberoi, Bangalore is an exceptional haven of opulence, where luxury seamlessly intertwines with warm hospitality. My recent stay at this magnificent hotel left an indelible impression, and I am thrilled to share my appreciation for its unmatched service, breathtaking ambiance, and unrivaled attention to detail.

Upon entering the grand lobby, I was immediately captivated by the hotel's timeless elegance. The tasteful interior design, featuring a perfect blend of contemporary aesthetics and traditional Indian motifs, exudes a sense of refined sophistication. The Oberoi, Bangalore undoubtedly sets the stage for a truly unforgettable experience.

The rooms at The Oberoi, Bangalore redefine luxury living. From the moment I stepped into my suite, I was enveloped in a world of comfort and tranquility. The meticulous attention given to every detail, from the plush bedding to the captivating city views, spoke volumes about the hotel's commitment to excellence. The spaciousness of the room allowed me to unwind in absolute serenity, making it an ideal retreat after a long day of exploration.

What truly sets The Oberoi, Bangalore apart is its remarkable service. The staff's unwavering dedication to ensuring guest satisfaction is second to none. Every encounter was characterized by warmth, attentiveness, and a genuine desire to create a memorable experience. From the friendly concierge who offered invaluable suggestions for local attractions to the diligent housekeeping staff who kept my room immaculate, the team at The Oberoi, Bangalore exceeded my expectations in every way.

Dining at The Oberoi, Bangalore is an absolute delight for the senses. The hotel boasts a range of exceptional restaurants, each offering a distinctive culinary experience. Whether savoring Indian delicacies at the award-winning "Rim Naam" or indulging in global flavors at "Le Jardin," the culinary expertise on display was simply phenomenal. The exquisite presentation, impeccable service, and the use of the finest ingredients showcased the hotel's commitment to culinary excellence.

The Oberoi, Bangalore also houses a state-of-the-art spa and fitness center, where I had the opportunity to rejuvenate both body and mind. The spa's serene ambiance, coupled with a wide array of rejuvenating treatments, left me feeling utterly refreshed and pampered. The fitness center, equipped with top-of-the-line equipment, provided a perfect opportunity to maintain my wellness routine while enjoying the luxurious surroundings.

Situated in the heart of Bangalore, The Oberoi's location is ideal for both business and leisure travelers. Its proximity to prominent landmarks and commercial districts ensures easy accessibility, while the hotel's serene environment shields guests from the city's hustle and bustle.

In conclusion, The Oberoi, Bangalore is a true gem that offers an unforgettable luxury experience. Its impeccable service, breathtaking ambiance, and unwavering commitment to guest satisfaction set it apart from the rest. I wholeheartedly recommend this remarkable hotel to anyone seeking an indulgent retreat in the vibrant city of Bangalore.

#Interior
From the moment you step into it, the luxurious ambiance is palpable. The grand lobby, adorned with elegant chandeliers and contemporary art pieces, immediately sets a tone of sophistication and opulence. The interior design throughout the hotel is a tasteful blend of modern chic and classic elegance, with meticulous attention to detail evident in every corner. The rooms are spacious and beautifully appointed, featuring plush furnishings, high-quality linens, and state-of-the-art amenities that ensure a comfortable and stylish stay.

#Services
The service at is impeccable, truly deserving of a five-star rating. From the courteous and efficient front desk staff to the attentive housekeeping team, every member of the hotel staff goes above and beyond to cater to the guests' needs. The concierge service is particularly noteworthy, offering excellent recommendations and assistance with reservations, transportation, and local insights. Room service is prompt and professional, and the staff's warm hospitality makes you feel genuinely welcome.

# Food
The culinary offerings are nothing short of extraordinary. The on-site restaurants provide a diverse array of dining options, each one delivering a memorable gastronomic experience. The breakfast buffet is a feast for the senses, featuring an extensive selection of both local and international dishes, all prepared with the freshest ingredients. The fine dining restaurant is a highlight, offering a sophisticated menu that showcases the chef's creativity and expertise. Every meal is presented with artistic flair, and the flavors are impeccably balanced, making each bite a delight.

Highly recommended for those who seek the finest in hospitality.

From the moment you step into its grand lobby adorned with exquisite artworks and opulent furnishings, you're embraced by a sense of regality. The fusion of traditional Indian architecture with modern amenities is seamless, evoking a rich tapestry of heritage and sophistication.

text.text:
The Shangri-La Bengaluru is a luxurious hotel located in the heart of Bengaluru, India. Known for its elegance and top-notch service, it offers a wonderful experience for both business and leisure travelers.

One of the standout features of the hotel is its stunning architecture and design. The lobby is grand and exudes a sense of sophistication, while the rooms are spacious, tastefully decorated, and equipped with modern amenities. The hotel's attention to detail is evident in every aspect, from the beautifully appointed furnishings to the plush bedding.

The staff at Shangri-La Bengaluru is highly professional, courteous, and attentive. They go out of their way to ensure that guests have a comfortable stay and are always ready to assist with any requests or inquiries. The level of service provided is exceptional, making guests feel truly pampered and well taken care of.

Dining options at the hotel are diverse and impressive. The restaurants offer a wide range of cuisines, from local Indian delicacies to international dishes prepared by skilled chefs. The quality of food is outstanding, with an emphasis on using fresh ingredients and presenting dishes in an artful manner. The hotel also has a well-stocked bar where guests can enjoy a variety of drinks and cocktails.

The amenities at Shangri-La Bengaluru are excellent. The spa facilities are serene and provide a perfect retreat for relaxation and rejuvenation. The fitness center is well-equipped and caters to the needs of health-conscious guests. Additionally, the hotel has a beautiful outdoor swimming pool with a sun deck, allowing guests to unwind and soak up the sun.

The location of the hotel is another advantage. Situated in the upscale neighborhood of Malleshwaram, it offers easy access to popular attractions, shopping centers, and business districts in Bengaluru. The hotel also provides transportation services, making it convenient for guests to explore the city.

Overall, Shangri-La Bengaluru is a superb hotel that provides a memorable experience. From its luxurious accommodations and exceptional service to its excellent dining options and convenient location, it exceeds expectations in every aspect. Whether you're visiting Bengaluru for business or leisure, this hotel is sure to impress.

I recently had the pleasure of staying at the ITC Gardenia, and the experience surpassed all my expectations. From the moment I entered the hotel premises, I was greeted with warmth and sophistication, setting the tone for an unforgettable stay.

One of the first things that struck me was the spaciousness of the rooms. The attention to detail in the room design was evident, with a perfect blend of modern aesthetics and comfort. The inclusion of a Smart TV was a delightful surprise, offering a variety of entertainment options and making my downtime even more enjoyable.

The technological features in the room were truly impressive. The ability to control the lights and air conditioning with just a touch of a button added a level of convenience that enhanced my overall stay. It showcased the hotel's commitment to providing a seamless and modern experience for its guests.

The highlight of my mornings was the exquisite breakfast spread. The culinary offerings were not only diverse but also of exceptional quality. The chefs at ITC Gardenia have truly mastered the art of combining flavors, and each dish was a culinary delight. The breakfast experience alone is reason enough to choose this hotel for your stay.

The staff at ITC Gardenia deserves special mention. Their professionalism and attentiveness were commendable, ensuring that every request was met with a prompt and courteous response. It was evident that the hotel places a high value on customer satisfaction, and this commitment was reflected in every interaction.

If you're looking for a hotel that seamlessly blends modern amenities with impeccable service, ITC Gardenia is the perfect choice. I left with wonderful memories and a strong desire to return for another exceptional stay.

text.text:
A Truly Exceptional Experience at The Ritz-Carlton Bangalore

Tasteful decor and luxurious amenities are to be expected at a hotel of this caliber, but what truly sets The Ritz-Carlton Bangalore apart is its extraordinary staff. Every team member we encountered went above and beyond to make our stay unforgettable, and some truly deserve special recognition.

We walked into the hotel and were warmly greeted by an incredible young woman, Farzana, (who also happens to be the Front Office Manager). Farzana personally organized our check-in process, transforming what could have been a complicated situation into an effortless experience. I can hardly put into words how unforgettable she made our stay. Her friendly demeanor, infectious smile, bubbly personality, and boundless enthusiasm shone through in every interaction we had with her. It’s clear that Farzana loves her job and is genuinely committed to ensuring every guest has a perfect stay. By the time we left, she had made us feel like part of her family. In fact, she went so far as to come in on her day off to personally oversee our check-out! Farzana left an indelible mark on our hearts and truly made this trip extraordinary.

Another standout was Sarvajith, the manager of the hotel’s 3 restaurants. A casual breakfast conversation about cooking lessons turned into a unique culinary experience. Sarvajith took time out of his busy schedule to arrange this for us for the same afternoon.

He introduced us to Chef Murugesan, who patiently taught us to make appam, dosa, sambhar, and the potato masala filling. His tips, tricks, and kindness made the session memorable—and the next morning, he surprised us with an incredible platter of dosas at breakfast! Absolutely delicious and we devoured them!

Teerth also deserves a shoutout for arranging a spectacular high tea that turned into a delightful feast.

Every interaction during our stay was filled with warmth, care, and impeccable service. The Ritz-Carlton Bangalore is more than a luxurious destination; it’s a place where the staff turn a visit into a cherished memory.

I don’t usually write reviews, but this experience demanded one.

Bravo to the team for delivering not just a stay but an unforgettable experience!

text.text:
Unwelcome Treatment: Discrimination at Ritz Carlton Bangalore

Yesterday, I, along with my team of 12, visited Ritz Carlton with high expectations for a delightful dining experience. As a passionate food blogger and traveller, I was eager to capture the essence of The Market restaurant through my lens and share it with my audience. However, what unfolded was nothing short of a disgraceful display of discrimination that left us utterly upset.
Before even setting foot in The Market, we were rudely confronted by an Operations Manager named Jocelyn Vaz. With an air of superiority, he demanded that I switch off my camera and forbade any form of video recording. To add insult to injury, he then instructed his subordinate to monitor our every move, as if we were criminals plotting some wicked act. This humiliating experience was witnessed by my entire team, leaving me insulted in from of my team ad us feeling sidelined and disrespected.
Despite my attempt to address this issue personally with Jocelyn, the damage had already been done. It was only through the intervention of the Restaurant in charge, Mr. Sunil Kumar, that we received an acknowledgment for Jocelyn's inappropriate behaviour. While his apology was appreciated, it hardly compensated for the marked experience we suffered.
The incident at Ritz Carlton made us feel like unwelcome outsiders, unworthy of the same treatment as other guests. No number of regretful words can undo the sense of humiliation and disappointment that overshadowed what should have been a memorable dining experience. We had hoped for a good evening and hospitality, but instead, we were met with discrimination and disregard.

Moving forward, it is with great reluctance that we vow not to visit Ritz Carlton again. Our hard-earned money and loyalty deserve to be appreciated, not met with prejudice and hostility. It's disheartening to see such behaviour tolerated in a renowned establishment like Ritz Carlton.

I've had the opportunity to travel extensively and experience hospitality from some of the world's finest establishments, including Taj, Leela, The Oberoi, ITC, Four Seasons, and many others. Never have I encountered such disrespectful treatment. Even at 3-star and 4-star hotels where I've been personally invited, I've been greeted warmly, served by chefs, and offered premium accommodations with breathtaking views for me and my family. Unfortunately, the damage has been done, and this negative experience at Ritz Carlton stands out starkly against the backdrop of exceptional hospitality I've enjoyed elsewhere.

I must take a moment to express my gratitude to Miss Rajshree Buragohain for her efforts in arranging our space and providing exceptional service. Thank you, Rajshree.

The Four Seasons Hotel Bengaluru is a haven of luxury and sophistication in the heart of the city. Nestled within the lush Embassy ONE complex, the hotel exudes modern elegance while maintaining a warm and inviting atmosphere. From the moment you step into the grand lobby, you are greeted by impeccable design and serene greenery that creates an oasis-like ambience. The rooms are a masterpiece of comfort and style, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows with stunning views, plush bedding, marble bathrooms, and high-tech amenities that cater to every need.

Dining at the hotel is an experience in itself. CUR8, the all-day dining restaurant, offers a delectable range of international and Indian cuisines, with live cooking stations adding a touch of theatrical charm. For a more sophisticated affair, the Asian-inspired dining options and the poolside bar serve as perfect venues to unwind. The staff’s attention to detail and personalized service ensure that every guest feels valued and pampered. Whether you're here for a business trip or a leisurely retreat, the Four Seasons Bengaluru effortlessly combines luxury, comfort, and world-class hospitality to create an unforgettable stay.

Four Seasons Hotel Bangalore

I recently had the pleasure of staying at Four Seasons Hotel Bangalore, and it was an experience that truly lived up to the brand’s reputation for luxury and hospitality.

From the moment I arrived, the warm and attentive service stood out. The check-in process was seamless, and the staff made sure every request was handled with care. The room was elegantly designed, with plush bedding, modern amenities, and a breathtaking view of the city skyline. It was the perfect blend of comfort and sophistication.

The dining options were exceptional. The breakfast spread at CUR8 was diverse and delicious, featuring fresh, high-quality ingredients. I also had the chance to dine at Far & East, which offered an exquisite selection of Asian delicacies with impeccable presentation.

The pool and spa facilities added to the relaxation factor. The infinity pool was serene, and the spa treatments were rejuvenating, making it an ideal retreat after a long day.

The only minor drawback was that service at peak hours, especially in the restaurants, could be a tad slow. However, the staff’s professionalism and courteous nature made up for it.

Overall, Four Seasons Bangalore is an outstanding choice for a luxurious stay in the city. I highly recommend it for both business and leisure travelers. Looking forward to my next visit!

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️✨ (4.5/5)

The dining options were exceptional. The breakfast spread at CUR8 was diverse and delicious, featuring fresh, high-quality ingredients. I also had the chance to dine at Far & East, which offered an exquisite selection of Asian delicacies with impeccable presentation.

The pool and spa facilities added to the relaxation factor. The infinity pool was serene, and the spa treatments were rejuvenating, making it an ideal retreat after a long day.

The only minor drawback was that service at peak hours, especially in the restaurants, could be a tad slow. However, the staff’s professionalism and courteous nature made up for it.

Overall, Four Seasons Bangalore is an outstanding choice for a luxurious stay in the city. I highly recommend it for both business and leisure travelers. Looking forward to my next visit!

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️✨ (4.5/5)

text.text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at the Conrad Hotel in Bangalore for six days, and I must say, the experience was outstanding. From the moment I arrived, the staff ensured my stay was comfortable and enjoyable.

Food & Hospitality:
The food was absolutely delightful, especially the breakfast at The Lobby Brew. I’d like to specifically commend Vamshi, Prajip, and Taushif for their exceptional service during breakfast. They were attentive, polite, and made sure every meal was a pleasant experience. The in-room dining service, led by Ronald, was also impeccable—every order arrived promptly, and the quality of the food was top-notch.

Housekeeping:
A big shoutout to the housekeeping staff—Manoj, Rakesh, and Deepak—who maintained my room with great attention to detail. Their work was flawless, and they were always available for any requests with a smile.

Entrance Security:
The warmth and professionalism of Subhad, the guard at the entrance, didn’t go unnoticed. His courteous demeanor added a welcoming touch every time I entered or exited the hotel.

Executive Lounge:
I also want to praise the staff at the Executive Lounge—Utsavi, Wangshol, Shaina, Abinand, Monika, and Smita—for their hospitality. They consistently went above and beyond to make sure I had everything I needed, making the lounge a perfect place to unwind after a long day.

Overall, my stay at Conrad Bangalore was nothing short of exceptional. I highly recommend this hotel for anyone looking for excellent food, world-class hospitality, and an unforgettable experience.

text.text:
J.W. Marriott Bangalore: A Pinnacle of Luxury and Hospitality

Situated in the heart of Bangalore, J.W. Marriott stands as an epitome of luxury and excellence in the hospitality industry. With its world-class amenities, impeccable service, and stunning architecture, it is undeniably one of the best hotels in the city. This essay aims to shed light on the aspects that make J.W. Marriott Bangalore a standout choice for travelers seeking an unforgettable stay.

It offers Unparalleled Accommodation:
J.W. Marriott Bangalore offers a plethora of luxurious accommodations, ranging from spacious rooms to exquisite suites. Every room is meticulously designed, combining contemporary elegance with opulence. The stunning views of the city skyline add to the charm, allowing guests to indulge in a truly immersive experience. The hotel's attention to detail ensures that guests are provided with the utmost comfort and convenience throughout their stay.

2. Culinary Delights:
J.W. Marriott Bangalore takes pride in its diverse and exceptional culinary offerings. The hotel boasts a range of restaurants, each offering a unique dining experience. From authentic Indian cuisine at Spice Terrace to international delights at JW Kitchen, guests are treated to a gastronomic journey that tantalizes the taste buds. The hotel's commitment to sourcing fresh, local ingredients ensures that every meal is a delightful experience.

3. World-Class Amenities:
J.W. Marriott Bangalore leaves no stone unturned when it comes to providing top-notch amenities. The hotel features a state-of-the-art fitness center, a rejuvenating spa, and a stunning rooftop pool with panoramic views of the city. Additionally, the hotel offers ample event and meeting spaces with cutting-edge technology, making it an ideal choice for corporate gatherings and special occasions.

4. Impeccable Service:
The hallmark of J.W. Marriott Bangalore is its impeccable service. The staff is trained to anticipate and cater to every guest's need, ensuring a personalized experience that exceeds expectations. Whether it is arranging transportation, organizing memorable excursions, or attending to any special requests, the dedicated team is committed to providing a seamless and unforgettable stay.

5. Prime Location:
J.W. Marriott Bangalore enjoys a prime location in the heart of the city, making it easily accessible to business districts, shopping hubs, and tourist attractions. Its proximity to major transportation links ensures that guests can effortlessly explore all that Bangalore has to offer. Whether one is visiting for business or leisure, the hotel's central location proves to be a significant advantage.

Conclusion:
J.W. Marriott Bangalore stands as a testament to the finest hospitality in the city. Its luxurious accommodations, exceptional dining options, world-class amenities, and impeccable service make it one of the best hotels in Bangalore. Setting new standards in luxury and comfort, J.W. Marriott Bangalore promises an unforgettable experience for all its guests, leaving them with cherished memories and a desire to return.

text.text:
Title: A Regal Oasis in the Heart of the City: Taj West End

Rating: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5/5)

I recently had the pleasure of attending a friend's wedding at the majestic Taj West End, and the experience was nothing short of enchanting. Situated in the very heart of the city, this iconic hotel effortlessly combines luxury, elegance, and impeccable service.

The sprawling grounds of Taj West End create an oasis of tranquility amidst the urban hustle, offering a sense of serenity that is rare in the midst of a bustling city. The lush greenery, meticulously landscaped gardens, and the timeless architecture of the hotel set the stage for a truly regal experience.

The wedding celebration was hosted with utmost grace and sophistication. The event spaces at Taj West End exude opulence, providing the perfect backdrop for the joyous occasion. The attention to detail in the decor and arrangements was impeccable, reflecting the hotel's commitment to creating memorable experiences.

What truly sets Taj West End apart is the exemplary service. The staff's dedication to ensuring the comfort and satisfaction of the guests is evident in every interaction. From the warm welcome at the entrance to the flawless execution of the wedding festivities, the service surpassed all expectations.

The central location of Taj West End adds to its allure. Despite being in the heart of the city, once within the hotel's premises, one feels transported to a world of luxury and refinement. It's a testament to the hotel's ability to seamlessly blend the vibrancy of the city with the tranquility of a five-star retreat.

In conclusion, Taj West End is more than just a hotel; it's a haven of luxury in the midst of the city's pulse. My recent visit for my friend's wedding was a delightful experience, and I can't commend the hotel enough for its exquisite ambiance, top-notch service, and central location. A solid 5/5, and highly recommended for those seeking a touch of grandeur in Bangalore.

text.text:
The Hotel Taj MG Road in Bangalore is a truly exceptional establishment that embodies the essence of luxury and hospitality. Situated in the heart of the city, this iconic hotel has been a symbol of opulence and elegance for many years.

From the moment you step into the Taj MG Road, you are welcomed by grandeur and sophistication. The lobby is stunningly designed, exuding a sense of grandeur and offering a glimpse into the luxurious experience that awaits you. The staff is attentive, well-trained, and always ready to assist, ensuring that every guest is treated like royalty.

The rooms at the Taj MG Road are nothing short of breathtaking. Spacious, elegantly furnished, and adorned with modern amenities, they provide the perfect retreat after a long day of exploring the city. The plush beds and luxurious linens guarantee a restful night's sleep, while the panoramic views of the city skyline add to the overall charm of the rooms.

Dining at the Taj MG Road is an unparalleled experience. The hotel offers a variety of culinary options that cater to all tastes. From authentic Indian cuisine at the renowned Blue Ginger restaurant to global flavors at the all-day dining café, every meal is a gastronomic delight. The hotel also boasts an impressive array of bars and lounges, each with its own unique ambiance, where guests can relax and enjoy a drink in style.

text.text:
If you are looking for a luxurious stay in the heart of Bangalore's business and entertainment area, look no further than Taj MG Road Bengaluru. This stunning hotel, located on MG Road, has a wealth of amenities that will ensure a comfortable and memorable stay. A bit old but great service. From the moment you arrive at Taj MG Road Bengaluru, you will be struck by the sheer beauty of the property. The hotel's exterior is ok, and the interior is equally stunning. The hotel's spacious and luxurious rooms are fitted with all the amenities you could possibly need for a comfortable stay, including a flat-screen TV, work desk, living area, safe, and tea/coffee maker. The bathroom features a bathtub, which is perfect for a relaxing soak after a long day of exploring the city. One of the standout features of Taj MG Road Bengaluru is the outdoor pool. Whether you are looking to relax and unwind or keep up with your fitness routine, the hotel has you covered. The well-equipped fitness center is perfect for those who want to stay active during their stay, and the beauty parlor or barber shop is ideal for those who want to look their best.

The hotel also has state-of-the-art technology, which is perfect for business travelers. Whether you need to check your email or hold a conference call, the hotel has everything you need to stay connected. One of the highlights of Taj MG Road Bengaluru is the food at Taj. This restaurant serves up some of the best food in the city, and the service is impeccable. Whether you are looking for Indian cuisine or something a little more international, you are sure to find something that satisfies your taste buds.

Overall, I would highly recommend Taj MG Road Bengaluru to anyone looking for a luxurious stay in the heart of Bangalore's business and entertainment area. With its spacious and luxurious rooms, state-of-the-art amenities, and great food, it's the perfect place to stay whether you are travelling for business or pleasure.

I had the most delightful stay at Hotel Grand Mercure, a true gem of luxury and warmth! The staff’s infectious positivity and genuine kindness made every moment special—from the warm welcome at check-in to the attentive service throughout my stay. Their smiles and eagerness to assist created an atmosphere of pure joy, making me feel like royalty.
The culinary experience was exceptional, with an array of healthy, flavorful dishes that were as nourishing as they were delicious. Fresh, vibrant ingredients shone in every meal, from crisp salads to wholesome entrees, all beautifully presented and bursting with taste. The chefs clearly prioritize quality and wellness, catering to every palate with finesse.
What truly elevated the experience was the enchanting fragrance that enveloped the entire premises. A subtle, refreshing scent of citrus and florals lingered in the air, from the elegant lobby to the serene corridors, creating a calming and luxurious ambiance that was simply divine.
Every detail at Hotel Grand Mercure exudes sophistication, but it’s the cheerful staff, wholesome cuisine, and captivating fragrance that make this hotel an unforgettable haven. I can’t wait to return!

text.text:
Reflecting on my recent 5-day getaway to Goa and stay at Hyatt Centric, I am compelled to express my admiration for the hotel's unparalleled commitment to guest satisfaction. From the outset, the staff's warmth and courtesy set a welcoming tone, turning my visit into a truly memorable experience.

In response to my request for an early check-in, Hyatt Centric not only accommodated it seamlessly but also ensured my room was ready upon arrival, establishing a precedent for the exceptional service that followed. The thoughtful recommendation of ground floor-garden facing rooms, catering to my family's needs and providing easy access to the gaming zone and pool area, exemplified the hotel's meticulous attention to detail.

Throughout my stay, the staff consistently delivered prompt and top-notch service, underscoring their dedication to guest satisfaction. An aspect that particularly stood out was the proactive engagement of the staff in enhancing my overall experience. One staff member took the initiative to inquire about my interests and suggested a list of tourist spots to visit. This personal touch, where the staff volunteered and actively contributed to itinerary planning, was truly touching. It was a rare and delightful experience, as I haven't often encountered staff members proactively offering suggestions and assisting with planning. This level of engagement added an extra layer of personalization to my stay, showcasing the staff's genuine commitment to ensuring guests make the most of their time in Goa.

The culinary journey at Hyatt Centric continued to impress, with a diverse menu and exquisite preparations that catered to various tastes. The hotel's prime location further enhanced the overall appeal, providing easy access to Goa's vibrant attractions.

In conclusion, Hyatt Centric not only delivered luxurious accommodation but also excelled in personalized service that went above and beyond. The combination of seamless early check-in, family-friendly recommendations, meticulous attention to detail, and proactive staff engagement demonstrated the hotel's dedication to ensuring an unforgettable experience for every guest. I wholeheartedly recommend Hyatt Centric to fellow travelers seeking a perfect blend of comfort, convenience, and genuine hospitality in the heart of Goa.

text.text:
Stayed at the hotel during Dussehra weekend with family. This is our second stay, last was in 2018 and this is the second time our son celebrated his birthday at Renaissance.  We had a memorable stay, right from checkin till we checked out we had a great experience.

It's a horse themed hotel as it's adjacent to the race course. Our suite had a beautiful view of the race course.

The staff is very courteous, warm and always attentive to guests' needs. We enjoyed the food at Lush as well as at the bar lounge. Being a long weekend the restaurant was almost full during breakfast but we didn't have to wait for our orders and we received the same kind of personal attention which usually happens when the restaurants aren't full.

Special thanks to house keeping staff for taking extra effort to make us feel special.

Our last visit was within a few months of hotel's inauguration and it's really amazing to see the high standards being maintained in terms of their hospitality, food and overall guest experience.

We Would love to visit again sometime soon
